Description: Technical activities related to Power System Protection, Automation and control (including SCADA / RTU / Power Monitoring System (PMS) / PLC) like Automation Engineering and design, Protection / Control IEDs and network Device configuration, interfacing, HMI and system Integration, Testing & Commissioning including FAT / iFAT & SAT, troubleshooting, coordination of activities and related documentation.Skills
Skills: Technical knowledge related to Power System Protection, Automation & Control, including various communication protocols, (Modbus, DNP, IEC 61850, etc) application software of HMI/SCADA solutions & system / device configuration. Conversant with Quality Management System functions and documentation.
Direct work experience of a minimum 5 years in the field related to:

Power System Protection covering Programming / Testing & Commissioning of Protection, Control & Metering IEDs.
Power System Automation & Control covering Protection & Control IEDs, Power Monitoring System (PMS), SCADA/RTU/PLCS & HMI, Communication configuration & interfacing of network devices (routers, ethernet switches, gateways, servers)
Certified professional in applications software, database / network administration, installation and configuration of LAN/WNA/ATM.
